original_text: But the Lord said to me, “You have killed many people in the battles that you have fought. So you yourself will not build a house to give me honour. I have seen all the blood of the people that you have killed.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이 내게 임하여 이르시되 너는 피를 심히 많이 흘렸고 크게 전쟁하였느니라 네가 내 앞에서 땅에 피를 많이 흘렸은즉 내 이름을 위하여 성전을 건축하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said to me
in the battles that you have fought
So you yourself will not build a house
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 집을 짓지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I have seen all the blood
of the people that you have killed
